mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id menuId, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.title title, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM admin_role arr LEFT JOIN role r ON arr.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_menu rmr ON r.role_id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE arr.admin_id = #{adminId} AND m.menu_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.menu_id

SELECT m.menu_id menuId, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.title title, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM role_menu rmr LEFT JOIN menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.menu_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.menu_id

SELECT r.resource_id resourceId, r.create_time createTime, r.`name` `name`, r.url url, r.description description, r.resource_category_id resourceCategoryId FROM role_resource rrr LEFT JOIN resource r ON rrr.resource_id = r.resource_id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.resource_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.resource_id
